BABONUS.CONSUMPTION_APP.TITLE: Configure Consumption: {name}
BABONUS.DELETE.ARE_YOU_SURE: Are you sure that you want to delete '{name}'? This action cannot be undone.
BABONUS.FILTER_PICKER.abilities.REQUIREM: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to attack rolls, damage rolls, and save DCs.
BABONUS.FILTER_PICKER.attackTypes.REQUIR: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to attack rolls or damage rolls.
BABONUS.FILTER_PICKER.baseWeapons.REQUIR: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to attack rolls, damage rolls, and save DCs, and only if 'weapon' is selected as one of the Item Types.
BABONUS.FILTER_PICKER.creatureTypes.HEAD: Creature Types
BABONUS.FILTER_PICKER.customScripts.HEAD: Custom Script
BABONUS.FILTER_PICKER.damageTypes.REQUIR: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to attack rolls, damage rolls, and save DCs.
BABONUS.FILTER_PICKER.itemRequirements.R: This filter is only available for bonuses originating from items that can be equipped or attuned to.
BABONUS.FILTER_PICKER.itemTypes.REQUIREM: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to attack rolls, damage rolls, and save DCs.
BABONUS.FILTER_PICKER.saveAbilities.HEAD: Save DC Ability
BABONUS.FILTER_PICKER.saveAbilities.REQU: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to attack rolls, damage rolls, and save DCs.
BABONUS.FILTER_PICKER.spellComponents.RE: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to attack rolls, damage rolls, and save DCs, and only if 'spell' is selected as one of the Item Types.
BABONUS.FILTER_PICKER.spellLevels.REQUIR: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to attack rolls, damage rolls, and save DCs, and only if 'spell' is selected as one of the Item Types.
BABONUS.FILTER_PICKER.spellSchools.REQUI: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to attack rolls, damage rolls, and save DCs, and only if 'spell' is selected as one of the Item Types.
BABONUS.FILTER_PICKER.statusEffects.HEAD: Actor Conditions
BABONUS.FILTER_PICKER.targetEffects.HEAD: Target Conditions
BABONUS.FILTER_PICKER.throwTypes.REQUIRE: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to saving throws.
BABONUS.FILTER_PICKER.weaponProperties.R: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to attack rolls, damage rolls, and save DCs, and only if 'weapon' is selected as one of the Item Types.
BABONUS.LABELS.NAME: Name
BABONUS.MIGRATION.COMPLETED: Migration from previous Build-a-Bonus version has completed.
BABONUS.MIGRATION.IN_PROGRESS: Migration from previous Build-a-Bonus versions has begun. Please wait for the migration to complete.
BABONUS.MIGRATION.LOCKED_PACK: You have provided a compendium that is currently locked. No migration was performed.
BABONUS.PLACEHOLDERS.NAME: name…
BABONUS.SETTINGS.DisableCustomScriptFilt: Disable the "Custom Script" filters from having their values read. Instead the filter always immediately returns true. Enable this setting if you prefer other users not executing scripts.
BABONUS.SETTINGS.DISPLAY_LABEL.HINT: If checked, the label is displayed in the header of applicable items and effects.
BABONUS.SETTINGS.DISPLAY_LABEL.NAME: Display Label
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.abilities: The ability score used by the item. This respects items set to use defaults, such as spells using the spellcasting ability, or finesse weapons using either Strength or Dexterity.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.ADD_THIS_FILTER: Add this filter to the builder.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.arbitraryComparison: Insert numbers, roll data properties, strings, or a combination of the three, that must be in a specific relationship for the bonus to apply. This comparison can evaluate substrings by using either of the inequalities. You can also use roll data from a targeted token's actor by prepending with @target.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.ATTACK.BONUS: Additional parts to add on top of the attack roll such as 1d4 or @scale.rogue.sneak-attack.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.ATTACK.CRIT_RANGE: An integer to subtract from the critical range of the attack roll. This field respects roll data properties such as @abilities.int.mod, but not dice rolls such as 1d4.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.ATTACK.FUMBLE_RANGE: An integer to add to the fumble range of the attack roll. This field respects roll data properties such as @abilities.int.mod, but not dice rolls such as 1d4.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.attackTypes: The type of attack roll the item must have for the bonus to apply. For example if you cast a spell that must involve a ranged spell attack (rsak) or melee weapon attack (mwak).
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.AURA_FIELDS: Which targets should benefit from the aura, and whether the aura should affect its owner as well. Allies are defined as tokens that have the same disposition as the owner; enemies are those with a Hostile disposition (if you are Friendly) or Friendly disposition (if you are Hostile).
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.AURA_RANGE: The range of the aura, measured in feet (put in -1 for an unlimited range), and if the aura affects the area within a Measured Template instead (for items that are able to place a template).
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.AURA_SELF: Whether this aura should affect its owner as well.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.AURA_TEMPLATE: Whether this aura affects token actors within the area of a Measured Template, rather than token actors within a range of this item's owner.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.AURA: Whether this bonus should transfer to other token actors on a scene. A bonus transferred to another actor will still be evaluated against the filters below, acting as if the actor attempting to benefit from the aura was the owner of the bonus in the first place.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.baseWeapons: The type of weapon the item must be for the bonus to apply. For example Battleaxe, Shortbow, or Longsword.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.blockers: The status conditions that block an aura from being transferred, such as a paladin's aura that is only active while the paladin is neither dead nor unconscious. This has no effect if the aura is on a Measured Template.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.CONSUME: Configure whether and how the bonus consumes uses off its parent item.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.COPY_THIS: Create a duplicate of this bonus on this document.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.creatureTypes: The type of creature the target actor must be one of (or have as a subtype), or the type of creature the target must not be one of. For example 'undead', 'fey', or 'construct'.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.customScripts: Any custom script you want to write yourself. The script has to be completely synchronous and must return true or false. As helper variables, the script is supplied with 'token', 'actor', and 'item', if applicable.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.DAMAGE.BONUS: Additional parts to add on top of the damage roll such as 1d4 or @scale.rogue.sneak-attack.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.DAMAGE.CRIT_DICE: An additional number of dice that should be rolled on a critical hit. This field respects roll data properties such as @abilities.int.mod, but not dice rolls such as 1d4.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.DAMAGE.CRIT_DMG: Additional parts to add on top of the damage roll on critical hits such as 1d4 or @scale.rogue.sneak-attack.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.damageTypes: The type of damage the item must deal for the bonus to apply. For example if a spell deals fire damage.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.DELETE_THIS_FILTER: Remove this filter from the builder.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.DELETE_THIS: Delete this bonus from this document. Deletion is permanent and the bonus cannot be recovered.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.DESCRIPTION: A description of the bonus for your convenience.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.EDIT_THIS: Edit this bonus in the builder.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.HITDIE.BONUS: Additional parts to add on top of the hit die roll such as 1d4 or @scale.rogue.sneak-attack.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.IDENTIFIERS: Identifying information of the bonus. The name is for your convenience, while the id is used to refer to the bonus internally.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.itemAttuned: This bonus will be considered disabled unless this item is attuned to.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.itemEquipped: This bonus will be considered disabled unless this item is equipped.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.itemRequirements: Toggle whether the item should require being equipped or attuned to for the bonus or aura to be in effect.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.itemTypes: The types of items the bonus should apply to. For example if the item should only apply to spells or only to weapons.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.OPTIONAL: Toggle whether this bonus should be opted into when rolling.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.remainingSpellSlots: The minimum and maximum total number of remaining spell slots the actor must have for the bonus to apply. For example if you want a bonus to apply only if you have 3 spell slots or more remaining, or no spell slots remaining at all.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.SAVE.BONUS: An integer to add onto the DC of a saving throw. This field respects roll data properties, such as @abilities.int.mod, but not dice rolls such as 1d4.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.saveAbilities: The ability that must be used to set the saving throw DC of the item for the bonus to apply; for example a Battle Master fighter who determines their Maneuver DC with Dexterity. This can be different from the ability the item otherwise uses. If an item is set to scale with Spellcasting, the actor's spellcasting ability is compared against.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.SELF_ONLY: Toggle whether this bonus applies only to the item on which it is created.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.spellComponents: The components or spell tags the spell must have for the bonus to apply. You can choose whether the spell must have all of the given components or tags, or at least one of them. For example if you want a bonus to apply to all spells that require concentration.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.spellLevels: The level at which the spell must be cast for the bonus to apply. You can select each level individually. For example, you can have a bonus apply only to cantrips, only to leveled spells, or only to spells of 3rd level or below.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.spellSchools: The school the spell must belong to for the bonus to apply. If multiple schools are selected, the spell must belong to any one of them. For example, if you want a bonus to apply only to Divination spells.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.statusEffects: The conditions the actor must be affected by. For example blind;charm will mean you only get this bonus while either blinded or charmed. The module looks for Status Ids in the effects.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.targetEffects: The conditions the target actor must be affected by. For example blind;charm will mean you only get this bonus while your target is either blinded or charmed. The module looks for Status Ids in the effects.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.THROW.BONUS: Additional parts to add on top of the saving throw such as 1d4 or @scale.rogue.sneak-attack.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.THROW.DEATH_TARGET: An integer to subtract from the minimum requirement to pass a death saving throw. This field respects roll data properties such as @abilities.int.mod, but not dice rolls such as 1d4.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.throwTypes: The type of saving throw the bonus should apply to. This also applies to death saving throws, and you can adjust the target value of death saves as well.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.TOGGLE_THIS: Toggle this bonus on or off. A bonus that is toggled off will be completely ignored, even if it is an aura.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.weaponProperties: The weapon properties the item either must have or cannot have for the bonus to apply. If any are selected, the weapon must have at least one of the needed properties, and none of the unfit properties. For example if you want a bonus to apply only to Two-Handed weapons.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.WUTS_THIS.AURA: A set of configurations to make the bonus an aura, instead of only applying to the actor who owns it.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.WUTS_THIS.AVAILABLE_FIL: The list of filters you can apply to this bonus, further narrowing down which rolls it should apply to. Each filter must be true for the bonus to apply.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.WUTS_THIS.BONUSES: The actual values of the bonus and to which value it should apply. At least one of these fields must be filled.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.WUTS_THIS.CURRENT_BONUS: The bonuses you have created that are currently stored on this Actor, Item, or ActiveEffect.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.WUTS_THIS.CURRENT_FILTE: The filters currently applied to the bonus, further narrowing down which rolls it should apply to. Each filter must be true for the bonus to apply.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.WUTS_THIS.REQUIRED: These fields at the top are required to fill out for every bonus you want to create or edit.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.WUTS_THIS.SELECT_TARGET: Select a target for your new bonus; the type of roll to which it should apply.
BABONUS.TOOLTIPS.WUTS_THIS.UNAVAILABLE_F: The list of filters that are currently not available to apply to this bonus.
BABONUS.TRAITS.HINT: Open the Build-a-Bonus workshop. Here you can create situational bonuses that should apply automatically for various rolls, such as saving throws, damage rolls, and hit die rolls.
BABONUS.TRAITS.LABEL: Build-a-Bonus Workshop
BABONUS.TRAITS.NAME: Build-a-Bonus Workshop
BABONUS.WARNINGS.COPIED: The bonus '{name}' with id '{id}' has been successfully copied.
BABONUS.WARNINGS.DELETED: The bonus '{name}' with id '{id}' has been successfully deleted.
BABONUS.WARNINGS.INVALID: Some of the data is invalid. Please re-evaluate your selections.
BABONUS.WARNINGS.SUCCESS: The bonus '{name}' with id '{id}' has been successfully saved.
